name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WinHat - Have a Windows User Agent

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force user agent so that websites to see your computer as running Windows 10.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This was designed out of necessity for certain websites. All it does is spoof the User Agent on Mac OS and Linux machines, so that Chrome and Chromium tell websites that you're running Windows.
